Scatter plot of delta vs fold-change with quadrant assignment

plot_delta_vs_fc.Rd

Builds a tidy data.frame with quadrants and returns the ggplot scatter.

Usage

plot_delta_vs_fc(
  delta,
  fc,
  delta_thresh = 0.15,
  label_top = 5,
  label_size = 3,
  palette = c(Q1 = "#2E8B57", Q2 = "#C0392B", Q3 = "#C0392B", Q4 = "#2E8B57", Q0 =
    "grey70"),
  point_size = 2.2,
  alpha = 0.85,
  xlab = expression(delta),
  ylab = expression(log[2] * " FC"),
  title = "feature importance vs log2 fold-change"
)

Arguments

delta

named numeric vector of δ (features).

fc

named numeric vector of log2 fold-change (same names as delta).

delta_thresh

numeric; |δ| threshold to define Q1–Q4 (default 0.15).

label_top

integer; number of labels per quadrant (by |δ|). Set 0 to skip.

label_size

numeric; text size for labels.

palette

named colors for quadrants. Names should include Q1..Q4 and optional Q0.

point_size

numeric; scatter point size.

alpha

numeric in 0,1; point transparency.

xlab, ylab,

title axis labels and plot title.

Value

list with elements: data (data.frame) and plot (ggplot object).
